name: pinna
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the part of the ear on the outside of the head: Hearing begins when sound waves that travel through the air reach the outer ear, or pinna. All of these animals carry their pinnae side by side on top of the head. The pinnas were normally formed but slightly posteriorly rotated.
More examplesFewer examplesTumours are most frequently seen in young dogs, usually as a single lesion on the head, legs, or pinnae. In many animals, the pinna can be moved to scan the environment to locate sounds.
